newsitem.title: USA: Harper adds 100,000 shrs to buyback plan.
newsitem.headline: Harper adds 100,000 shrs to buyback plan.

text.p: Harper Group Inc on Monday said that at a special meeting held last Friday its board authorized the additional repurchase of up to 100,000 shares of its common stock.
From 1994 through the end of 1996, the company repurchased one million shares of its common stock.

Peter Gibert, chairman and chief executive officer of Harper, said, "The board is demonstrating its confidence in the company and our business plan by approving this additional buyback. We are committed to our strategy of designing customized programs to meet the international logistics needs of our customers. "
Harper expects to release its fourth quarter and year-end 1996 results on February 24.
